17.movie_plot: A rebellious young man with a troubled past comes to a new town, finding friends and enemies.

116.movie_plot: An ingenue insinuates herself into the company of an established but aging stage actress and her circle of theater friends.

57.movie_plot: Investigating a gold magnate's smuggling, James Bond uncovers a plot to contaminate the Fort Knox gold reserve.

109.movie_plot: A drama critic learns on his wedding day that his beloved maiden aunts are homicidal maniacs, and that insanity runs in his family.

107.movie_plot: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.
